thread.title: Visit Maldives Year 2016: Maldives launches global advertising campaign with BBC
thread.title_full: Visit Maldives Year 2016: Maldives launches global advertising campaign with BBC

author: eTN Editor
title: Visit Maldives Year 2016: Maldives launches global advertising campaign with BBC
text:
Visit Maldives Year 2016: Maldives launches global advertising campaign with BBC Original, timely global, travel, tourism, business news and research: 
Sep 10, 2015 eTN Exclusive: Unique and original, timely, global breaking news: 
Maldives Marketing and PR Corporation (MMPRC) has launched a global advertising campaign with BBC to promote the Maldives as a tourism destination and the upcoming Visit Maldives Year 2016. The campaign which will run from September 1 to October 31, 2015 will feature the unique aspects of the Maldives tourism product under the tag line “Sunny side of life” in a new 30 second commercial and 4x15 sec teasers reaching to a worldwide audience across important regional markets of Europe and Asia Pacific. In addition, the advertisement will be run on site bbc.com, video on demand section with 1,020,400 impressions targeting Europe and Asia Pacific. 
The campaign aims to raise the profile of Maldives as a world class destination appealing to affluent travelers by reminding them of Maldives as a holiday destination and promote the upcoming Visit Maldives Year 2016. 
713,622 tourists have visited the country this year from January to July. This is a positive growth of 1.7 percent compared to the same period in 2014.
